FOUND IN: Daedalian hero (referring to Theseus and the labyrinth)

"My stomach is a bottomless pit" - This idiom communicates the insatiable nature of our appetite when we are left hungry, implying that no matter how much one eats, there is always an endless desire for more sustenance.
Nacreous: Pertaining to a shining, iridescent quality similar to mother-of-pearl's appearance.
Giza, Egypt - Most iconic pyramid site with the Great Pyramid of Khufu
